unsolved: Security issues e.g. no security policies implemented
use_cases_desc: The proof-of-concept application demonstrates an example application that enriches visitor experience in a museum
contribution_desc: A framework and architecture for UI distribution that eases development of distributed user interfaces. It works without the need for a dedicated server and runs a distribution manager on any mobile device that then acts as the master device managing UI distribution based on user interactions or change of device configurations.
device_models: Android and desktop (Java is used as programming language to support those devices)
